Package projectmanager.app

Class Summary
Activity  
AppStorage Class that takes care of permanent storage for the app.
Company  
DelegatedWork Delegated Work is created when a project-leader delegates a work to a given employee
Employee A class that defines an employee.
Project  
ProjectManagerApp Main class for the Project Manager Application.
RegisteredWork Registered Work is created when a employee has registered that he has worked on an activity.
StoredData Class that holds the reorganized data being stored permanently by the application in a file.
Work Class that holds any given amount of work that has been registered from or delegated to an employee.
WorkWeek WorkWeeks is attached to employees.
 

Exception Summary
CreatingActivityException This exception is thrown when an error related to creating or editing an activity occures
OperationNotAllowedException This exception is thrown when a error related to a operation which is not allowed by the employee
ProjectManagerException This exception is a generel exception for most of the exceptions in this application
RegisterWorkException This exception is when a error related to registering work occures.
